name: FIND THE CHEST (Henrique Grecco)
description:
A Find the chest is a third-person adventure and exploration game in which you take on the role of a knight in search of 

hidden treasures in an ancient and sinister tower.

The tower has many puzzles, traps and is infested with powerful monsters, which fiercely guard each floor of the building. 

You'll need all your cunning and skill to solve the puzzles and evade these creatures and traps to advance through the floors of the tower.

Here is some interesting information
